org.eel.kitchen.jsonschema.validator

Interface JsonValidator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArrayValidator, InstanceValidator, JsonValidatorCache.FailingValidator, ObjectValidator

    public interface JsonValidator
    Interface which all JSON validators must implement

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean validate(ValidationContext context, ValidationReport report, com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode instance)
      Validate the instance, and tell whether validation should continue

    • Method Detail

      • validate

        boolean validate(ValidationContext context,
               ValidationReport report,
               com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode instance)
        Validate the instance, and tell whether validation should continue

        Note: the return value is currently unused.

        Parameters:
        context - the validation context
        report - the validation report
        instance - the instance to validate
        Returns:
        true if validation should proceed
